name: decodeTopLevelObject(of:forKey:)
desc: Decode an object as one of several expected types, failing if the archived type does not match.
declaration: func decodeTopLevelObject<DecodedObjectType>(of cls: DecodedObjectType.Type, forKey key: String) throws -> DecodedObjectType? where DecodedObjectType : NSObject, DecodedObjectType : NSCoding
